page.title: 09SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content: In Southville Road there is a youth centre for children aged mainly under 19. People aged over 20 are not allowed in. In the Glebelands there are four football pitches plus one artificial pitch in the Arena. Across Longford River there are another two football and rugby pitches. The Feltham swimming baths are equiped with a gym,weight training,a pistol range,three squash courts and table-tennis tables. Feltham Park has a bowling green,putting green,cricket pitch,football pitch and four hard core tennis courts. Feltham School is having a new sports complex being built and at present it has two astroturf pitches which are used every day of the week by both the school and the local community.
